name: SPACE DYNAMICS LABORATORY (SDL)
sampleDescriptions: SDL is a not for profit University Affiliated Research Center (UARC) for the Departments of Defense (DOD).  As such, SDL works closely with DOD and federal government as a trusted partner across milit
